ygData.subject: Re: Paw of Opolla
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Just kill him.. :) ... You do need to keep clearing the top area near the zone.. I have had him spawn 3 times in 1 1/2 hours (only carried the ring third
ygData.messageBody:
"Lai, Martin ML" wrote:
>
>
> I'm part way through the Paw quest too and I need some help.
> 1. Can I actually buy a Rat Meat Pie (or Rat Ear Pie) from Qeynos Hills, or can I only get the recipe from Rephas and still have to find a skilled baker to bake the pie? Rephas views me dubiously and won't talk to me anyway, but I have the recipe. I looked in the shop at the middle of the Hills zone and they didn't sell the pie. Tried to right click on Rephas but he's not a merchant npc.

Just kill him.. :)

> 2. Is there a proven method of getting Gynok Moltor to spawn? I've tried to keep the level 1 entrance area clear and keep the broken stairs room clear, neither got him to spawn after a few hours.

You do need to keep clearing the top area near the zone.. I have had him
spawn 3 times in 1 1/2 hours (only carried the ring third time - the one
time I was hurt and out of mana and had to zone to stop him killing me..
) and other times I've camped him for a week and only seen him once (and
I had been asking friends who were camping while I was offline and he
hadn't spawned). In the end I bought the damn ring off a Wiz (who was 7
levels below me) who KS him from me AGAIN.. damn they are far too
powerful.. Aren't we supposed to be the masters of undead destruction...
pah!

Vinamin
Son of Innoruuk
Priest of The Lady
Erollisi Marr
